Params: {3: 'The vehicle creaks and grinds as it starts up, trembling precariously but ultimately roaring to life.'}
{2: "Phew... That did the trick. Luck's still on our side.", 3: '7'}
{2: 'So, find anything useful in those documents?', 3: '8'}
{3: "After successfully starting the mining cart, you turn back to Liv's side. The only surviving vehicle in the mine begins to move forward, gradually picking up speed."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Let's see... We have Rodent's exploration logs, some laboratory protocols, equipment inventories...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Liv sifts through the documents gathered from the lab's perimeter, her eyes catching on crucial data which she swiftly feeds into her terminal."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It doesn't seem like there's anything of immediate value. Maybe... Hm?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, her fingers freeze, then move rapidly as a report materializes on the screen.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Psychologist Generation III... Are these Melinoe's treatment records?", 4: '18'}
{1: 'Position: Coal Mining Machine Operator, Sector Two', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'Family Status: Married with one son. Has not returned to his home city in 3 years.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-1', 8: '1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Andre', 3: "I can't work anymore. I just can't do this... I want to go home...!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Andre', 3: 'I already told you! I want to go home! I want to go HOME!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Andre', 3: 'To hell with "occupational burnout"! There\'s nothing wrong with my mind! I\'m not sick!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Andre, still connected to several electrode pads, stares blankly into space.'}
{2: 'Andre', 3: 'What did I... want to do just now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Melinoe', 3: 'Your psychological consultation is complete. Thank you for your compliance. Please rate your experience. We look forward to your next visit.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Presenting Issue: Severe occupational burnout, marital tensions', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-4', 8: '1', 10: '1'}
{3: 'The treatment records alone amount to over 1,300 entries.'}
{3: 'You both release a synchronized, weary sigh at the 2,600-page testament to Melinoe\'s "work."'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Next, surveillance footage unfolds, years of it, recorded from inside the "psychological treatment room."'}
{3: 'There she sits, Melinoe, a constant, smiling figure receiving a stream of mine workers and lab staff.'}
{3: 'One by one, they enter bristling with rage, and one by one, they depart, their burdens seemingly lifted.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mine Employee A', 3: "The machines...! They've all gone crazy!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mine Employee B', 3: "They're evacuating everyone. Come on, we have to move! Now— Agh!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mine Employee A', 3: 'Hey! Stay with me... ****! What are we supposed to do now?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mine Employee C', 3: 'What does it look like?! We run!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mine Employee A', 3: "But what about Melinoe? She's the company's asset!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mine Employee C', 3: "Forget the company! We're not gonna make it, and you're worried about that?!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'A violent crash of sound—metal shrieks, screams are cut short. The camera shudders and tilts, casting the world at a nauseating angle.'}
{3: 'Perhaps a backup generator deep in the mine hums on, because the lens remains a living eye.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The "Model III-0007-Psychiatrist Generation III" sits silently behind the desk. Then, without any human activation, it slowly opens its eyes.'}
{3: 'With the slow, grating creak of dry metal, she stands and walks toward the fallen camera—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "...We're almost at the lab on the other side, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
